abstract: The Major League Baseball All Star game suffered a pounding Tuesday night from “America’s Got Talent” on NBC, and it looks like this year’s game will be the lowest-rated in history.
snippet: The Major League Baseball All Star game suffered a pounding Tuesday night from “America’s Got Talent” on NBC, and it looks like this year’s game will be the lowest-rated in history.
lead_paragraph: 4:34 p.m. | Updated Americans, it seems, like talented people who can jump over beds of nails and ride motorcycles in cages more than they like the best sluggers and pitchers in baseball.

headline.main: Viewers Choose ‘Talent’ Over Big League Bats
